lectures.name: Callbacks & Higher-Order Functions in JavaScript
lectures.description: Higher-order functions, callbacks, and functional programming - Learn to use map, filter, reduce, and other higher-order functions for data transformation and manipulation

questions.description: Write a function convertToString that accepts an array of letters and returns all the letters combined

testCases.description: Convert array of letters to string
Convert array of letters to 'hello'

questions.description: Write a function averageGrade that accepts an array of student grades as values and returns the average grade. If an empty array was passed in return 'Please enter at least one grade'

testCases.description: Calculate average of grades
Calculate average of different grades

testCases.expected: Please enter at least one grade
testCases.description: Handle empty array case

questions.description: Write a function evenLengthOddIndex that accepts an array of strings and returns a new array of only the even-length words that are in an odd index

testCases.description: Filter even-length words at odd indices
Filter even-length words at odd indices with different order
No even-length words at odd indices

questions.description: Write a function incrementByIndex that accepts an array of nested arrays that hold numbers as values, and returns an array where each element of the nested arrays is incremented by the index of that nested array

testCases.description: Increment nested arrays by their index
Increment multiple nested arrays by their indices

questions.description: Write a function countWords that accepts a string and returns an object that has all of the unique words from the string as keys, and the number of times a word was found in the string is shown as the value of that key

testCases.description: Count word occurrences in string
Count single word
Handle empty string

questions.description: Write a function orderByType that accepts an array of mixed type values and returns a new array with the same values but ordered by type, meaning all the strings first, then all the numbers, and all the booleans last

testCases.description: Order mixed types: strings, numbers, booleans
Order strings and numbers

questions.description: Write a function gradeExam that accepts an array of objects and return an array of only the passed subjects with modified value, instead of the grade saying passed, the passing grade is 50 or above

testCases.description: Filter and modify passed subjects
Filter and modify multiple passed subjects
No passed subjects

questions.description: Write a function allNumbers that accepts an array and returns true if all the values are numbers and returns false if it is not

testCases.description: All numbers array returns true
All numbers including negative and zero
Mixed types returns false
Numbers and boolean returns false

questions.description: Write a function convertToObject that accepts an array of key-value pairs arrays, and return an array of objects with the corresponding keys and values

testCases.description: Convert single key-value pair to object
Convert multiple key-value pairs to objects

questions.description: Write a function fibonacci that accepts a number argument, and returns an array that it's indices are Fibonacci numbers (from zero to the number) and its values are the values of the sequence at that index

testCases.description: Generate Fibonacci sequence up to index 4
Generate Fibonacci sequence up to index 7
Generate Fibonacci sequence up to index 10
